response.overview: A story that unfolds over the course of a single night — Arjun, a 24-year-old man struggling to find a job and stability in life, faces constant rejection. One midnight, he crosses paths with Vidya, a 23-year-old saleswoman, at a bus stop. Seizing the moment, Arjun invites her for a cup of tea. Vidya agrees, and as the night goes on, the two open up about their personal lives. As the conversation deepens, Vidya begins to feel an inexplicable connection — a sense of familiarity, as if she has known Arjun before.
response.tagline: One night. Two souls. One memory
response.title: Memories Only
